paper_abstract: We present an algorithm to compute rth roots in F(q)m with complexity (O) over tilde[( log m + r log q) m log q] if (m, q) = 1 and either (q(q - 1), r)= 1 or r vertical bar(q - 1) and r vertical bar((q - 1)/ r, r) = 1. This compares well to previously known algorithms, which need O(rm(3) log(3) q) steps.
paper_title: Efficient computation of roots in finite fields
